title: Bagels and Beans
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Take-out, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Dutch-owned chain of lunchrooms Bagels & Beans offers a menu inspired not by American-style bagels but the tastes and herbs of Europe and Southern France. Offers vegetarian and vegan bagels, sweets, coffee, and fresh juices. Could replace cream cheese with hummus for some items. Free Wi-Fi.
